titleStmt.title: Three sermons viz. 1. A commission for an assise, granted to the saints, 2. A close hypocrite discovered, 3. The lawfulnesse of doing good out of hope of reward / by Daniel Cawdrey ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.Y. for Ph. Nevill, and are to be sold by Peter Whaley ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

Each of the three sermons has a separate t.p.: "A commission for an assise, or, A remedie against lawing ..."; "Epichairekakia, or, A close hypocrite discovered"; "Vindic√¶ spei, shewing the lawfulnesse of doing good out of hope of reward".
